LanguageData.GotBredByAnimal.stages.0.label: raped by animal
LanguageData.GotBredByAnimal.stages.0.description: Oh God... I was raped by an animal. The sheer humiliation of it...How can I look anybody in the eye now? I think I can still smell it on me...
LanguageData.GotAnalBredByAnimal.stages.0.label: bred anally by animal
LanguageData.GotAnalBredByAnimal.stages.0.description: I was raped...anally... by an animal. I can't get any lower than this; I just want to crawl in a hole and die. Please, nobody look at me...
LanguageData.MasochistGotBredByAnimal.stages.0.label: raped by animal
LanguageData.MasochistGotBredByAnimal.stages.0.descri: An animal raped me. It makes me feel so dirty and deviant, like a filthy sow being bred...not bad.
LanguageData.MasochistGotAnalBredByAnimal.stages.0.de: I was raped...anally... by an animal. The way it utterly humiliated me by rutting on me mindlessly like I was just some pig who deserved nothing better...I could get used to this.
LanguageData.ZoophileGotBredByAnimal.stages.0.label: bred by animal
LanguageData.ZoophileGotBredByAnimal.stages.0.descrip: An animal made love to me, just like I was one too...It's so much more better than with a human..
LanguageData.ZoophileGotAnalBredByAnimal.stages.0.des: That animal just took me anally and made me its bitch...The way it mounted me...it just makes me want to touch myself all over again just thinking about it.
LanguageData.AllowedAnimalToBreed.stages.0.label: bred by animal
LanguageData.AllowedAnimalToBreed.stages.0.descriptio: I was so horny that I let an animal mount me. I feel ashamed for enjoying it...
LanguageData.GotLickedByAnimal.stages.0.label: raped by animal
LanguageData.GotLickedByAnimal.stages.0.description: An animal forced their tongue inside me.
LanguageData.MasochistGotLickedByAnimal.stages.0.desc: An animal forced their tongue inside me. I kinda liked it...
LanguageData.ZoophileGotLickedByAnimal.stages.0.label: ravished by animal
LanguageData.AllowedAnimalToLick.stages.0.label: licked by animal
LanguageData.AllowedAnimalToLick.stages.0.description: I let an animal lick me. I feel ashamed, but kinda liked it...
LanguageData.GotGropedByAnimal.stages.0.label: molested by animal
LanguageData.GotGropedByAnimal.stages.0.description: An animal molested me. I feel dirty.
LanguageData.MasochistGotGropedByAnimal.stages.0.desc: An animal molested me. I kinda liked it...
LanguageData.ZoophileGotGropedByAnimal.stages.0.label: molested by animal (Zoophile)
LanguageData.AllowedAnimalToGrope.stages.0.label: groped by animal
LanguageData.AllowedAnimalToGrope.stages.0.descriptio: I was so horny that I let an animal grope me. I feel ashamed...
